attributes.action: We need NHS England to fund VIMIZIM for MORQUIO sufferers
attributes.additional_details:
There is no way without vimizim Please help us by taking a few minutes to sign this petition.


Thankyou
attributes.background: My daughter Amalia suffers from a rare disease Morquio Syndrome. There is a drug called VIMIZIM which slows down the progression of this disease which prolongs and improves the quality of life! Ourselfs and other morquio sufferers need this desperately and are waiting for a decision.

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104559

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way. 10,000 signatures would guarantee a response from the government.
